cast.name: 安德烈娅·瓦西里 Andreea Vasile

introduction: A woman who works in the corporate environment takes her friend on a trip to the rural area of Romania, where she hopes to find a house to move into in the near future, continuing to work remotely. In order to have a more authentic countryside experience, they prefer to sleep overnight at the house of an old lady from the village, instead of a touristic guesthouse. During the night, a local man appears at the door of their accommodation, aggressively demanding his borrowed money. The two friends are starting to be afraid, thinking that they are staying exactly in the debtor's room, and that the villager will come in to them, in any second. The situation escalates and they witness crimes they've never anticipated.
